headline: PG&E Corporation (PCG): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on PG&E Corporation on Aklan Investment Research’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on PCG. PG&E Corporation’s share was trading at $16.28 as of February 5th. PCG’s trailing and forward P/E were 13.64 and 10.02 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. PG&E Corporation (PCG) is the holding company for Pacific Gas & Electric Company, a regulated electric and gas utility serving approximately 16 million customers across Northern and Cent

headline: PG&E Corporation, Lockheed Martin, Salesforce, and Wells Fargo Announce the Launch of EMBERPOINT LLC
summary: PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) is included among the 12 Best Nuclear Energy Stocks to Buy Now On January 27, 2026, PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG), alongside Lockheed Martin, Salesforce, and Wells Fargo, announced the launch of EMBERPOINT LLC, a joint venture focused on wildfire detection, prevention, and response. headline: Salesforce Lands Major Army AI Deal As Valuation Discount Persists
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) has been awarded a 10 year, US$5.6b contract with the U.S. Army to deliver secure data and AI technologies. The deal is described as one of the largest government cloud and AI agreements to date, focused on federal digital modernization. Salesforce also launched EMBERPOINT, an AI driven public safety alliance with Lockheed Martin, PG&E, and Wells Fargo. EMBERPOINT aims to apply Salesforce’s AI agent platforms, autonomous tech, and data tools to wildfire prevention and...
